import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import _HeaderMovieDetails from './_HeaderMovieDetails'; import _HeaderMovieCast from './_HeaderMovieCast'; import shaw from '../../Static/Images/shaw.png'; import narcos from '../../Static/Images/narcos.png' import { Button, Container, Menu, Responsive, Segment, Visibility, Grid, Divider, Image, Header, Search, Icon, Dropdown, Label } from 'semantic-ui-react' const _Header = ({ backImages, moviePost }) => { const [bgColor, setBgColor] = useState('#111111'); const [width, setWidth] = useState(window.innerWidth); useEffect(() => { const handleResize = () => setWidth(window.innerWidth); window.addEventListener('resize', handleResize); if (width < 1000) setBgColor('transparent') else setBgColor('#111111') return () => { window.removeEventListener('resize', handleResize); }; }); return ( {/* Theatres Promotions Showtimes Bookings */}
Narcos

<_HeaderMovieDetails url="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AGv_F9hpQ-w" />

A gritty chronicle of the war against Colombia's infamously violent and powerful drug cartels.
) } export default _Header;
